name: 3D Hardcore Cube
description: 3D Hardcore Cube - this is not an easy platformer in which you want to get to the portal and not to fall into the trap. The game has boosters traffic boosters bounce, anti bounce, falling cubes, turrets and more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: AMD fx6300 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9800 GT Storage: 200 MB available space
